solution_line_template: Of {total_attendees} people in attendance at the school dance, 10% were school faculty and staff, or a total of {faculty_staff_percent_value}*{total_attendees}=<<{total_attendees}*{faculty_staff_percent_value}={faculty_staff_count}>>{faculty_staff_count} people.
Of the remaining attendees, two-thirds were girls, or ({girls_fraction})*{remaining_students}=<<({girls_fraction})*{remaining_students}={girls_count}>>{girls_count} attendees were girls.
Thus, the remaining {remaining_students}-{girls_count}=<<{remaining_students}-{girls_count}={boys_count}>>{boys_count} students were boys who attended the school dance.
